getReplacementValue

public java.lang.String getReplacementValue(int dico,
                                            java.lang.String value,
                                            int definitionNumber)
returns the definition associated to a word in target dictionnary

Parameters:
dico - the dictionnary in which to look
value - the value to search
definitionNumber - the number of the definition to look for, as a value can have more than one definition, i.e. the postition of the definition on a line.
Returns:
the definition
